concept.title: Checkpoint Storage for Streaming Pipelines
concept.shortdesc: When the runs a cluster streaming pipeline, on either Mesos or YARN, the generates and stores checkpoint metadata. The checkpoint metadata provides the offset for the origin.

conbody.p: cluster pipelinescheckpoint storage for streaming pipelinesThe stores the checkpoint metadata in the following path on HDFS or Amazon S3:/user/$USER/.streamsets-spark-streaming/<DataCollector WorkerID>/<Kafka topic>/<consumer group>/<pipelineName>
When you run a cluster streaming pipeline on YARN, the stores the metadata on HDFS.
When you run a cluster pipeline on Mesos, the can store the metadata on HDFS or Amazon S3.
